data.title: Movie Magic Production Scheduling Software
data.meta_description: Industry-best digital production scheduling software. Efficiency and flexlibility have joined with innovative technology to help you work smarter, not longer.
data.text: Set the tone from day oneâand make sure your cast and talent are always on the same page with the essential tool for production professionals scheduling any size project from episodic to reality to film. Build detailed production schedules with Movie Magic Schedulingâs robust, easy-to-use interface. Save time managing script breakdowns and call sheets with workflows designed to incorporate the time-tested concepts of the stripboard while offering a variety of scenarios to consider including different shoot lengths, re-ordered scenes and comparisons of location. Design custom crew reports that allow your team to make the best decisions based on real-time data. And so much more.
